summary: All requirements have been implemented. The diff includes backend Service data structure extensions with settings and pricing tiers, an updateService mutation with admin access control, frontend useUpdateService mutation hook with query invalidation and toast notifications, a ServiceEditDialog component with tabs for Details and Settings, and integration of the edit button on ServiceDetailPage visible only to admins. All acceptance criteria are met.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module (backend/migration.mo) for migrating old Service data structure to new structure
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not specify migration functionality, data migration, or handling of existing service data structure changes. The constraint mentions not breaking compatibility but does not request a migration module.
